languages.text: Милость Императора пала на головы пораженных скверной, и очистительный огонь поглотил их тела. По крайней мере, их души не достанутся коварному Имматериуму.

traits.locale_text: Милость Императора пала на головы пораженных скверной, и очистительный огонь поглотил их тела. По крайней мере, их души не достанутся коварному Имматериуму.

languages.text: The corrupted were granted the Emperor's mercy, their bodies consigned to the purifying flame. At least their souls were safe from the Immaterium's treachery.
languages.original_text: Милость Императора пала на головы пораженных скверной, и очистительный огонь поглотил их тела. По крайней мере, их души не достанутся коварному Имматериуму.

traits.locale_text: The corrupted were granted the Emperor's mercy, and their bodies were consigned to the purifying flame. At least their souls were safe from the Immaterium's treachery.
The corrupted were granted the Emperor's mercy, and their bodies were consigned to the purifying flame. At least their souls were safe from the Immaterium's treachery.

The corrupted were granted the Emperor's mercy, their bodies consigned to the purifying flame. At least their souls were safe from the Immaterium's treachery.
The corrupted were granted the Emperor's mercy, their bodies consigned to the purifying flame. At least their souls were safe from the Immaterium's treachery.

languages.text: 那些遭到腐化的船员得到了帝皇的仁慈。他们的尸体被扔进了净化的烈焰之中，至少他们的灵魂没有受到亚空间的玷污。
languages.original_text: The corrupted were granted the Emperor's mercy, their bodies consigned to the purifying flame. At least their souls were safe from the Immaterium's treachery.

traits.locale_text: 那些遭到腐化的船员得到了帝皇的仁慈。他们的尸体被扔进了净化的烈焰之中，至少他们的灵魂没有受到亚空间的玷污。

languages.text: A los corruptos se les concedió la misericordia del Emperador, sus cuerpos fueron entregados a la llama purificadora. Al menos sus almas estaban a salvo de la traición del Inmaterio.
languages.original_text: The corrupted were granted the Emperor's mercy, their bodies consigned to the purifying flame. At least their souls were safe from the Immaterium's treachery.

traits.locale_text: A los corruptos se les concedió la misericordia del Emperador, sus cuerpos fueron entregados a la llama purificadora. Al menos sus almas estaban a salvo de la traición del Inmaterio.

languages.text: 腐敗した者達に皇帝の慈悲が与えられて、彼らの体は浄化の炎に委ねられた。少なくとも、その魂は非物質世界の陰謀から自由になったのだ。
languages.original_text: The corrupted were granted the Emperor's mercy, their bodies consigned to the purifying flame. At least their souls were safe from the Immaterium's treachery.

traits.locale_text: 腐敗した者達に皇帝の慈悲が与えられて、彼らの体は浄化の炎に委ねられた。少なくとも、その魂は非物質世界の陰謀から自由になったのだ。

languages.text: Les corrompus ont bénéficié de la miséricorde de l'Empereur, leurs corps sont confiés aux flammes purificatrices, et leurs âmes sont désormais à l'abri de l'influence néfaste de l'Immaterium.
languages.original_text: The corrupted were granted the Emperor's mercy, their bodies consigned to the purifying flame. At least their souls were safe from the Immaterium's treachery.

traits.locale_text: Les corrompus ont bénéficié de la miséricorde de l'Empereur, leurs corps sont confiés aux flammes purificatrices, et leurs âmes sont désormais à l'abri de l'influence néfaste de l'Immaterium.

languages.text: Den betroffenen Crewmitgliedern wurde die Gnade des Imperators gewährt, ihre Körper wurden den läuternden Flammen übergeben. Zumindest waren ihre Seelen so geschützt vor der Heimtücke des Immateriums.
languages.original_text: The corrupted were granted the Emperor's mercy, their bodies consigned to the purifying flame. At least their souls were safe from the Immaterium's treachery.

traits.locale_text: Den betroffenen Crewmitgliedern wurde die Gnade des Imperators gewährt, ihre Körper wurden den läuternden Flammen übergeben. Zumindest waren ihre Seelen so geschützt vor der Heimtücke des Immateriums.

languages.text: Yozlara İmparator'un merhameti bahşedildi, bedenleri arındırıcı alevlere teslim edildi. En azından ruhları, Tindiyar'ın hainliğinden kurtulmuş oldu.
languages.original_text: The corrupted were granted the Emperor's mercy, their bodies consigned to the purifying flame. At least their souls were safe from the Immaterium's treachery.
